title: My phones battery power is fluctuating and shutting down, minutes after unplugging the device.
content:
My phone is shutting down almost immediately after unplugging the device. I need to plug it back in to turn the device on again. When I do, the battery indicator shows the phone as being out of power. When I look at the graph showing the history of the amount of power the phone has, it shows the phones power fluctuating rapidly before shutting off. When I charge the phone up again, it does it all over again.

I did some research and came the conclusion that the Android operating system might be out of sync with the battery indicator, so I followed the directions and powered up the device while it was turned off, and while it was on. This did not fix the device however.

Please, someone help me.
